issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
h5.This is a regression. We see the appc splashscreen for app built with sdk 3.2.3.GA

h5.Description:
1. Create a BB app (classic or alloy).
2. Build the app with latest 3.3.0 sdk or the sdk mentioned above.
3. At app launch look at the splash screen.

h5.Actual Result:
1. We do not see the appc splashscreen when app is built with latest 3.3.0 sdk.

h5.Expected Result:
1. We should see the appc splashsceen when app is built with latest 3.3.0 sdk.
fields.summary: BlackBerry: No Appcelerator splash screen shown
fields.environment:
Environment:
Appc Studio : 3.3.0.201405121247
Ti SDK : 3.3.0.v20140514163013
Mac OSX : 10.8.5
Alloy : 1.4.0-alpha
CLI - 3.3.0-dev

comments.body:
Verified fixed on:
Mac OSX 10.9.3
Appcelerator Studio, build: 3.3.0.201405161313
Titanium SDK, build: 3.3.0.v20140520141136
Titanium CLI, build: 3.3.0-alpha3
Alloy:1.4.0-alpha2
BlackBerry SDK, build: 10.2.0.1155
BlackBerry Device: 10.2.1.2947

Splash screen displays correctly on device.
Closing.
